name: Die Already (itch)
description:
Fight your friends in an intense local top-down 1v1 arena game! Play as an awesome robot blasting your opponent to bits with various weapons and punish your opponent with PowerDowns!

Diversifiers used:

  • Gamebert (add at least one gamebert to the game)
  • Wait, something changed (add some procedural generation or randomness (items, enemy spawns, etc) to increase replay value)

Made by:

Athmane Hassouna

Mihai-Alexandru Grosu

Raul Brumar

Rover Vos

Art assets by:

Arrows icons created by Pixel perfect - Flaticon

Bomb icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Circle icons created by Afian Rochmah Afif - Flaticon

Natural disaster icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Fan icons created by berkahicon - Flaticon

Volcano icons created by mnauliady - Flaticon

Asteroid icons created by DinosoftLabs - Flaticon

Crosshair icons created by Creaticca Creative Agency - Flaticon
